name: Senior Seminar in Criminology
description: Restricted to Criminology, Law and Society Specialists and Major. Topics vary from year to year and are noted on the timetable once confirmed. [24S]
prerequisites: SOC205H5/SOC231H5, SOC209H5, SOC221H5, SOC222H5, 0.5 SOC credit at the 300 level, 4th Year Standing, P.I.
